Provincial clearcut data from  https://catalogue.data.gov.bc.ca/dataset/harvested-areas-of-bc-consolidated-cutblocks-

Description: output of Stan model
Summarised hydrometric data from HYDAT Water Survey of Canada data
1975-2018 spawner data (combined aerial counts and mark-recapture, for graphing)
all the data that the Stan model looks at. Predictor variables are scaled
all the data that the Stan model looks at. Predictor variables are unscaled
1990-2018 recruitment data, adjusted for unmarked hatchery releases. Produced for Chuck Parken
Nicola spawner brood table by age, adjusted for unmarked hatchery releases.
Table with total, wild and hatchery spawners for each run year
Table with unmarked hatchery returns summed by brood year
Master table of wild, hatchery and total spawners, by brood year and return age
Get daily historical Environment Canada weather data (from weathercan package) for weather stations in Nicola watershed and save to a .csv
Get HYDAT flow data and summarise by months, to then be used in recruitment analysis
Make the figures that show changes in air temp, precipitation, water allocations, and logging
Make figures from model output and from hydrometric data, showing posterior effect sizes and effect of August flow on recruitment
Runs all candidate models in Stan, does WAIC and LOO for all the candidate models, saves tables of comparisons and saves figures of comparisons
The main analysis script. Compiles all the data for the model, saves it, runs top model in Stan, saves posterior model output

The big script that takes CWT hatchery release data, CWT adult return data, escapement data, exploitation rate data, and hatchery removals and builds the brood table accounting for unmarked hatchery returns

This is exported from a shapefile that is an intersect of all the named watersheds in the Nicola watershed, and all provincial cut blocks in the Nicola watershed. The AREA_HA field is the area of the named watershed that the cut block is located within, and the areaCut_ha field is the area of the cut block
This script takes the exported shapefile data and calculates the percent of each subcatchment that was logged in the past 20 years
This is the output of the calculate_clearcut_area_by_catchment.R script. Contains percent clearcut since 2000 for all subcatchments
